data.label:
LineNo: 3984468,

Narrator: Inside the building, I was greeted...
en


Inside the building, I was greeted by Ciara's assistants. They led me to a meeting room where she was waiting inside. She stood and gripped my hand.

LineNo: 3984672,

Narrator: Ciara had scheduled a short meeting...
en


Ciara had scheduled a short meeting at the Ministry of Education to discuss the current curriculum taught in schools.

LineNo: 3984774,

Narrator: The ministry building was located i...
en


The ministry building was located in the government district right next to the Ministry of Health. It was tall, narrow and wedge-shaped, like a slightly opened book.

LineNo: 3984882,

Narrator: Near the front gate, there were man...
en


Near the front gate, there were many statues of world-renowned scientists and thinkers. The largest, of course, was of Artvin Einstavn, the greatest scientist of all time.

LineNo: 3984984,

Narrator: Above the main entrance was the fam...
en


Above the main entrance was the familiar inscription, 'Instreten sis er Anginicar av Gereigna, int olla Almergwolltene, int olla Mexis'. 'Education is the premise of progress, in all societies, in all families.'

LineNo: 3985086,

Ciara Walda: “Good afternoon, Mr. President.”
en


“Good afternoon, Mr. President.”

LineNo: 3985196,

Player: “Good afternoon, Ciara.”
en


“Good afternoon, Ciara.”

LineNo: 3985202,

Player: “Good afternoon, Ciara.”
Menu Text en


“Good afternoon, Ciara.”

LineNo: 3985304,

Player: “Let's start.”
en


“Let's start.”

LineNo: 3985310,

Player: “Let's start.”
Menu Text en


“Let's start.”

LineNo: 3985412,

Ciara Walda: “I will cut straight to the chase.”
en


“I will cut straight to the chase.”

LineNo: 3985792,

Ciara Walda: “Our progressive reform of the Sord...
en


“Our progressive reform of the Sordland education system is well underway. But there is one sticking point.”

LineNo: 3985894,

Ciara Walda: “You've elected not to reform the S...
en


“You've elected not to reform the Sordland education system -- I've already voiced my many objections to that, but I respect your decision. There is, however, one sticking point."

LineNo: 3985996,

Ciara Walda: “It involves evolution versus creat...
en


“It involves evolution versus creationism.”

LineNo: 3986098,

Player: “I don't see a problem with teachin...
en


“I don't see a problem with teaching our children both theories.”

LineNo: 3986104,

Player: “I don't see a problem with teachin...
Menu Text en


“I don't see a problem with teaching our children both theories.”

LineNo: 3986206,

Ciara Walda: “As it currently stands, schools ac...
en


“As it currently stands, schools across Sordland can decide whether to include evolution, creationism or both in their curriculum."

LineNo: 3986308,

Player: “I don't agree with teaching our ch...
en


“I don't agree with teaching our children supernatural nonsense like creationism.”

LineNo: 3986314,

Player: “I don't agree with teaching our ch...
Menu Text en


“I don't agree with teaching our children supernatural nonsense like creationism.”

LineNo: 3986416,

Player: “Evolution is the idea that ought t...
en


“Evolution is the idea that ought to be banned. It's dangerous."

LineNo: 3986422,

Player: “Evolution is the idea that ought t...
Menu Text en


“Evolution is the idea that ought to be banned. It's dangerous."

LineNo: 3986524,

Ciara Walda: “That's great to hear! It sounds li...
en


“That's great to hear! It sounds like we are already aligned on the matter.”

LineNo: 3986626,

Ciara Walda: “That would be one way to compromis...
en


“That would be one way to compromise, yes. But does creationism really help open the minds of our children?”

LineNo: 3986728,

Ciara Walda: “The way I see it, it promotes the...
en


“The way I see it, it promotes the blind acceptance of the world as it is, no facts or verification needed."

LineNo: 3986830,

Ciara Walda: Children should be encouraged to t...
en


"Children should be encouraged to think critically and ask questions. Creationism and other religious teachings hinder that.”

LineNo: 3986956,

Ciara Walda: No, creationism is the real danger.
en


"No, creationism is the real danger."

LineNo: 3987058,

Ciara Walda: Children should be encouraged to t...
en


"Children should be encouraged to think critically and ask questions. Creationism and other religious teachings hinder that.”

LineNo: 3987176,

Player: “There must be a place for our reli...
en


“There must be a place for our religion in schools. How else will children learn moral correctness?"

LineNo: 3987182,

Player: “There must be a place for our reli...
Menu Text en


“There must be a place for our religion in schools. How else will children learn moral correctness?"

LineNo: 3987284,

Player: “Nonsense. Learning about creationi...
en


“Nonsense. Learning about creationism doesn't mean that you are not questioning.”

LineNo: 3987290,

Player: “Nonsense. Learning about creationi...
Menu Text en


“Nonsense. Learning about creationism doesn't mean that you are not questioning.”

LineNo: 3987392,

Player: “What about this so-called *evoluti...
en


“What about this so-called *evolution theory*? Why should children blindly accept that?”

LineNo: 3987398,

Player: “What about this so-called *evoluti...
Menu Text en


“What about this so-called *evolution theory*? Why should children blindly accept that?”

LineNo: 3987500,

Ciara Walda: “How does encouraging schools to re...
en


“How does encouraging schools to reject evolution make sense? Do you think learning about evolution makes a person question less?”

LineNo: 3987618,

Ciara Walda: “It's the exact opposite. Evolution...
en


“It's the exact opposite. Evolution is a theory that was created by using observational data over the span of many years.”

LineNo: 3987720,

Ciara Walda: “I might add that evolution is also...
en


“I might add that evolution is also most likely going to be proven in the future, as there is empirical evidence.”

LineNo: 3987846,

Player: “*Most likely*. You are saying this...
en


“*Most likely*. You are saying this while it is certain that the word of God is true.”

LineNo: 3987852,

Player: “*Most likely*. You are saying this...
Menu Text en


“*Most likely*. You are saying this while it is certain that the word of God is true.”

LineNo: 3987954,

Ciara Walda: “Learning about religion does not m...
en


“Learning about religion does not make everyone morally correct, does it?”

LineNo: 3988056,

Ciara Walda: Are you forgetting the recent reli...
en


"Are you forgetting the recent religiously motivated terror attacks? Or that according to Nurity, women like myself are second-class citizens?"

LineNo: 3988182,

Player: “It's not the same thing.”
en


“It's not the same thing.”

LineNo: 3988188,

Player: “It's not the same thing.”
Menu Text en


“It's not the same thing.”

LineNo: 3988290,

Ciara Walda: “You know what? This is going nowhe...
en


“You know what? This is going nowhere.”

LineNo: 3988392,

Ciara Walda: “Learning about the history of crea...
en


“Learning about the history of creationism is fine. That's not the problem. The problem is when you see people call ideas like evolution "dangerous".

LineNo: 3988494,

Player: “My evidence is God. You can look a...
en


“My evidence is God. You can look anywhere in the beauty of the world and see the evidence.”

LineNo: 3988500,

Player: “My evidence is God. You can look a...
Menu Text en


“My evidence is God. You can look anywhere in the beauty of the world and see the evidence.”

LineNo: 3988602,

Ciara Walda: “Whereas religion demands we believ...
en


“Whereas religion demands we believe in the word of one book, many scientists have worked on countless experiments.”

LineNo: 3988704,

Player: “That doesn't change what I think.”
en


“That doesn't change what I think.”

LineNo: 3988710,

Player: “That doesn't change what I think.”
Menu Text en


“That doesn't change what I think.”

LineNo: 3988812,

Ciara Walda: “That sort of dogmatic thinking is...
en


“That sort of dogmatic thinking is exactly the problem.”

LineNo: 3988914,

Ciara Walda: “When you look at these buildings,...
en


“When you look at these buildings, these cars or planes, the product of human work and technology, do you see God?”

LineNo: 3989016,

Ciara Walda: “I see people. I see scientists and...
en


“I see people. I see scientists and researchers. Not God. People made those.”

LineNo: 3989118,

Ciara Walda: “Without changing your perspective...
en


“Without changing your perspective by learning about new things, how are we going to ever progress?”

LineNo: 3989220,

Ciara Walda: “How is that not the same thing? Yo...
en


“How is that not the same thing? You just said religion brings moral correctness.”

LineNo: 3989322,

Ciara Walda: “Where is the evidence of that?
en


“Where is the evidence of that?"

LineNo: 3989424,

Player: “Nurity has brought us so far. Why...
en


“Nurity has brought us so far. Why are you denying it all?”

LineNo: 3989430,

Player: “Nurity has brought us so far. Why...
Menu Text en


“Nurity has brought us so far. Why are you denying it all?”

LineNo: 3989532,

Player: “It doesn't change what I think.”
en


“It doesn't change what I think.”

LineNo: 3989538,

Player: “It doesn't change what I think.”
Menu Text en


“Whatever. Doesn't change what I think.”

LineNo: 3989640,

Ciara Walda: “Your kind of dogmatic thinking is...
en


“Your kind of dogmatic thinking is exactly the problem.”

LineNo: 3989742,

Ciara Walda: “Without changing your perspective...
en


“Without changing your perspective by learning about new things, how are we going to ever progress?”

LineNo: 3989844,

Ciara Walda: “Because to change the future, some...
en


“Because to change the future, sometimes you need to accept that the past is wrong.”

LineNo: 3989946,

Ciara Walda: “Otherwise there is no progress.”
en


“Otherwise there is no progress.”

LineNo: 3990048,

Player: “How dare you defy the one true law...
en


“How dare you defy the one true law of the universe? God.”

LineNo: 3990054,

Player: “How dare you defy the one true law...
Menu Text en


“How dare you defy the one true law of the universe? God.”

LineNo: 3990156,

Ciara Walda: “The problem is creationism says th...
en


“The problem is creationism says that it knows *the answer* without any evidence.”

LineNo: 3990258,

Ciara Walda: “I-”
en


“I-”

LineNo: 3990360,

Ciara Walda: “There is clearly no point in discu...
en


“There is clearly no point in discussing this with you.”

LineNo: 3990462,

Player: “How dare you defy the one true law...
en


“How dare you defy the one true law of the universe? God.”

LineNo: 3990468,

Player: “How dare you defy the one true law...
Menu Text en


“How dare you defy the one true law of the universe? God.”

LineNo: 3990570,

Player: “How dare you defy the one true law...
en


“How dare you defy the one true law of the universe? God.”

LineNo: 3990576,

Player: “How dare you defy the one true law...
Menu Text en


“How dare you defy the one true law of the universe? God.”

LineNo: 3990678,

Player: “You know what I think? Evolution p...
en


“You know what I think? Evolution poisons young minds.”

LineNo: 3990684,

Player: “You know what I think? Evolution p...
Menu Text en


“You know what I think? Evolution poisons young minds.”

LineNo: 3990786,

Ciara Walda: “How can you say that? With what ev...
en


“How can you say that? With what evidence do you say that? Let me guess. None.”

LineNo: 3990888,

Player: “Then they should learn about both....
en


“Then they should learn about both.”

LineNo: 3990894,

Player: “Then they should learn about both....
Menu Text en


“Then they should learn about both.”

LineNo: 3990996,

Ciara Walda: “That's fine. I can live with that....
en


“That's fine. I can live with that.”

LineNo: 3991106,

Ciara Walda: “When I look at nature, I see biolo...
en


“When I look at nature, I see biology. I see chemistry. I don't see a God under my microscope.”

LineNo: 3991208,

Player: “Regardless, I don't believe school...
en


“Regardless, I don't believe schools need to ban creationism entirely. I don't see the harm in letting students decide for themselves.”

LineNo: 3991214,

Player: “Regardless, I don't believe school...
Menu Text en


“Regardless, I don't believe schools need to ban creationism entirely. I don't see the harm in letting students decide for themselves.”

LineNo: 3991316,

Ciara Walda: “Honestly, that's a valid argument....
en


“Honestly, that's a valid argument.”

LineNo: 3991418,

Ciara Walda: “I can live with that.”
en


“I can live with that.”

LineNo: 3991520,

Player: “You have a point. Perhaps there is...
en


“You have a point. Perhaps there is no place for creationism in schools.”

LineNo: 3991526,

Player: “You have a point. Perhaps there is...
Menu Text en


“You have a point. Perhaps there is no place for creationism in schools.”

LineNo: 3991628,

Narrator: Lucian Galade knocked and entered.
en


Lucian Galade knocked and entered.

LineNo: 3991736,

Lucian Galade: “Excuse me. Some urgent business ke...
en


“Excuse me. Some urgent business kept me away.”

LineNo: 3991838,

Ciara Walda: “Welcome, Mr. Galade.”
en


“Welcome, Mr. Galade.”

LineNo: 3991940,

Player: “Why were you late?”
en


“Why were you late?”

LineNo: 3991946,

Player: “Why were you late?”
Menu Text en


“Why were you late?”

LineNo: 3992048,

Player: “Glad you came. I need to hear some...
en


“Glad you came. I need to hear some opinions that make sense.”

LineNo: 3992054,

Player: “Glad you came. I need to hear some...
Menu Text en


“Glad you came. I need to hear some opinions that make sense.”

LineNo: 3992156,

Lucian Galade: “Oh. Very well.”
en


“Oh. Very well.”

LineNo: 3992258,

Lucian Galade: “Very well. Let's hear them.”
en


“Very well. Let's hear them.”

LineNo: 3992360,

Player: “We were just discussing the curric...
en


“We were just discussing the curriculum. Ciara has made some excellent points.”

LineNo: 3992366,

Player: “We were just discussing the curric...
Menu Text en


“We were just discussing the curriculum. Ciara has made some excellent points.”

LineNo: 3992468,

Lucian Galade: “The General Staff had some concern...
en


“The General Staff had some concerns about the Rumburg border. I already provided you with a report. Nothing else.”

LineNo: 3992578,

Lucian Galade: “Mr. President.”
en


“Mr. President.”

LineNo: 3992680,

Lucian Galade: “Ms. Walda.”
en


“Ms. Walda.”

LineNo: 3992798,

Narrator: Ciara frowned.
en


Ciara frowned.

LineNo: 3992900,

Ciara Walda: “Continuing from my previous point....
en


“Continuing from my previous point...”

LineNo: 3993002,

Ciara Walda: “...It is my conviction that we sho...
en


“...It is my conviction that we should require the mandatory teaching of evolution in Sordland's public schools and cut creationism completely out.”

LineNo: 3993104,

Ciara Walda: “If we want children from rural are...
en


“If we want children from rural areas to have the same opportunities as their urban counterparts, this is the way.”

LineNo: 3993206,

Ciara Walda: “Opening students' minds and reduci...
en


“Opening students' minds and reducing the role of religion in schools will also lead to more equality between young men and women.”

LineNo: 3993308,

Lucian Galade: “Don't bring your pet cause into th...
en


“Don't bring your pet cause into this, Ms. Walda. You failed your reforms, and now you want to remove belief from schools?”

LineNo: 3993688,

Ciara Walda: “Advancing women's rights is more t...
en


“Advancing women's rights is more than just a pet cause. Both of you gentlemen must know that."

LineNo: 3993790,

Ciara Walda: “Also, we all know why the educatio...
en


“Also, we all know why the education reforms failed. Don't we?”

LineNo: 3993892,

Narrator: Ciara looked at me.
en


Ciara looked at me.

LineNo: 3994010,

Player: “Yes, and I am disappointed. I expe...
en


“Yes, and I am disappointed. I expected more from you.”

LineNo: 3994016,

Player: “Yes, and I am disappointed. I expe...
Menu Text en


“Yes, and I am disappointed. I expected more from you.”

LineNo: 3994118,

Player: “Your education budget didn't make...
en


“Your education budget didn't make the cut. Nothing can be done about it.”

LineNo: 3994124,

Player: “Your education budget didn't make...
Menu Text en


“Your education budget didn't make the cut. Nothing can be done about it.”

LineNo: 3994226,

Narrator: Ciara's eyes widened in disbelief a...
en


Ciara's eyes widened in disbelief and she opened her mouth to say something but she didn't.

LineNo: 3994328,

Ciara Walda: “Action and consequence. I told you...
en


“Action and consequence. I told you before.”

LineNo: 3994430,

Player_Italic: I didn't say anything.
en


I didn't say anything.

LineNo: 3994436,

Player_Italic: I didn't say anything.
Menu Text en


Say nothing.

LineNo: 3994538,

Lucian Galade: “Going back to the topic...”
en


“Going back to the topic...”

LineNo: 3994640,

Lucian Galade: “Although I myself believe in evolu...
en


“Although I myself believe in evolution, we must be careful not to alienate our rural conservative voter base."

LineNo: 3994742,

Lucian Galade: “We owe a lot to their support. For...
en


“We owe a lot to their support. Forcing their school districts to teach evolution could irreparably damage our standing with them."

LineNo: 3994844,

Ciara Walda: “Every modern nation is reducing or...
en


“Every modern nation is reducing or removing creationism in their curriculum. Yet we are supposed to allow schools to promote fundamental -- and, yes, sexist -- ideas from a thousand years back?”

LineNo: 3994946,

Lucian Galade: “So is that what we are doing now?...
en


“So is that what we are doing now? Copying what other nations are doing instead of paving our own way?”

LineNo: 3995048,

Ciara Walda: “If it works, why not? Look at the...
en


“If it works, why not? Look at the analysis. It is clear that the superpowers are doing something right.”

LineNo: 3995150,

Narrator: Their voices started to get louder...
en


Their voices started to get louder and louder. I held up my hands for silence.

LineNo: 3995268,

Ciara Walda: “Should we reinvent the wheel, Mr....
en


“Should we reinvent the wheel, Mr. Galade? You speak as if we don't import *any* influences from other countries.”

LineNo: 3995370,

Lucian Galade: “That's not what I said.”
en


“That's not what I said.”

LineNo: 3995472,

Player: “We can still allow creationism to...
en


“We can still allow creationism to be taught alongside evolution. Ciara, you could live with that.”

LineNo: 3995478,

Player: “We can still allow creationism to...
Menu Text en


“We can still allow creationism to be taught alongside evolution. Ciara, you could live with that.”

LineNo: 3995580,

Ciara Walda: Yes, although I won't like it. I s...
en


"Yes, although I won't like it. I still believe schools are no place for religion."

LineNo: 3995682,

Player: “Schools should be able to teach cr...
en


“Schools should be able to teach creationism exclusively.”

LineNo: 3995688,

Player: “Schools should be able to teach cr...
Menu Text en


“Schools should be able to teach creationism exclusively.”

LineNo: 3995790,

Player: “Evolution is the way forward. Crea...
en


“Evolution is the way forward. Creationism has no place in the public school curriculum.”

LineNo: 3995796,

Player: “Evolution is the way forward. Crea...
Menu Text en


“Evolution is the way forward. Creationism has no place in the public school curriculum.”

LineNo: 3995898,

Ciara Walda: “Thank you! As I said, it's the onl...
en


“Thank you! As I said, it's the only way to produce a new generation of thinkers.”

LineNo: 3996000,

Ciara Walda: “I can't believe you're ignoring al...
en


“I can't believe you're ignoring all my arguments. What is the motivation here? To go back to 1739?”

LineNo: 3996102,

Lucian Galade: “The motivation is to respect the b...
en


“The motivation is to respect the beliefs of Sordland's heartland, not foist unwanted teachings on them.”

LineNo: 3996204,

Lucian Galade: “There are other methods of bringin...
en


“There are other methods of bringing Sordland forward. Ones that don't sever our ties with an entire voter base."

LineNo: 3996306,

Lucian Galade: “I won't like it, either. You'll ha...
en


“I won't like it, either. You'll have to prepare to lose a lot of voters."

LineNo: 3996408,

Narrator: Ciara looked me in the eye.
en


Ciara looked me in the eye.

LineNo: 3996516,

Ciara Walda: “It is your decision. Don't forget,...
en


“It is your decision. Don't forget, future generations of Sordish youth are counting on you.”

LineNo: 3996634,

Player: “I will make the teaching of evolut...
en


“I will make the teaching of evolution mandatory, but schools may promote creationism alongside it if they wish."

LineNo: 3996640,

Player: “I will make the teaching of evolut...
Menu Text en


“I will make the teaching of evolution mandatory, but schools may promote creationism alongside it if they wish."

LineNo: 3996748,

Player: “From now on, creationism shall be...
en


“From now on, creationism shall be banned and only evolution will be taught in schools.”

LineNo: 3996754,

Player: “From now on, creationism shall be...
Menu Text en


“From now on, creationism shall be banned and only evolution will be taught in schools.”

LineNo: 3996862,

Player: We will stick to the current syste...
en


"We will stick to the current system. Evolution will not be mandatory, and schools that wish to teach creationism exclusively may do so."

LineNo: 3996868,

Player: We will stick to the current syste...
Menu Text en


"We will stick to the current system. Evolution will not be mandatory, and schools that wish to teach creationism exclusively may do so."

LineNo: 3997910,

Ciara Walda: “Excellent decision, Mr. Rayne.”
en


“Excellent decision, Mr. Rayne.”

LineNo: 3998012,

Lucian Galade: “Unfortunate, but it will have a be...
en


“Unfortunate, but it will have a better outcome than banning creationism altogether.”

LineNo: 3998114,

Ciara Walda: “I can't believe this.”
en


“I can't believe this.”

LineNo: 3998216,

Lucian Galade: “This will certainly help us retain...
en


“This will certainly help us retain our popularity among conservatives. Also, a less educated populace is more easily managed.”

LineNo: 3998318,

Lucian Galade: “As your chief strategist, my job i...
en


“As your chief strategist, my job is to advise you on the political landscape and I can guarantee that this won't do us well.”

LineNo: 3998420,

Ciara Walda: “I disagree. Rejecting creationism...
en


“I disagree. Rejecting creationism would have been a signal that we were redirecting Sordland toward a scientifically and technologically advanced future.”

LineNo: 3998522,

Ciara Walda: “Sometimes there are more important...
en


“Sometimes there are more important things, Mr. Galade.”

LineNo: 3998624,

Ciara Walda: “Like ideals.”
en


“Like ideals.”

LineNo: 3998726,

Ciara Walda: “I can't believe you just said that...
en


“I can't believe you just said that.”

LineNo: 3998828,

Narrator: They turned and looked at each othe...
en


They turned and looked at each other. Lucian lifted his eyebrow and Ciara held his gaze for a couple of seconds.

LineNo: 3998936,

Narrator: The meeting ended shortly after.
en


The meeting ended shortly after.

LineNo: 3999520,

Ciara Walda: Rural schools often decide in favo...
en


"Rural schools often decide in favor of creationism only, which puts students at a disadvantage when it comes to entering university. The effect is especially noticeable among young women."

LineNo: 3999622,

Ciara Walda: My suggestion is to make the teach...
en


"My suggestion is to make the teaching of evolution mandatory, and preferably ban creationism altogether."

LineNo: 3999740,

Ciara Walda: It promotes the blind acceptance o...
en


"It promotes the blind acceptance of the world as it is, no facts or verification needed."

LineNo: 3999842,

Ciara Walda: Your budget cuts may have put the...
en


"Your budget cuts may have put the brakes on our plans for education reform but there is one important change that can still be made."

LineNo: 4000222,

Lucian Galade: Ms. Walda, don't bring your pet ca...
en


"Ms. Walda, don't bring your pet cause into this. Mr. President, there are other considerations you may not have thought about."

LineNo: 4016764,

Narrator: Ciara had scheduled a short meeting...
en


Ciara had scheduled a short meeting at the Ministry of Education to discuss the current curriculum taught in schools.

LineNo: 4016872,

Narrator: Ciara had scheduled a short meeting...
en


Ciara had scheduled a short meeting at the Ministry of Education to discuss the current curriculum taught in schools.

LineNo: 4016980,

Narrator: Ciara had scheduled a short meeting...
en


Ciara had scheduled a short meeting at the Ministry of Education to discuss the current curriculum taught in schools.

LineNo: 4017088,

Narrator: Ciara had scheduled a short meeting...
en


Ciara had scheduled a short meeting at the Ministry of Education to discuss the current curriculum taught in schools.

LineNo: 4021482,

Ciara Walda: The lack of governmentral resource...
en


"The lack of governmentral resources have halted our plans for education reform but there is one important change that can still be made."
